DataElement.preferredName: Social Environment Neighborhood Concentrated Disadvantage Assessment Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Relating to human society and its members._The totality of surrounding conditions._The recognition that low neighborhood socioeconomic conditions have an impact on the services and opportunities available to its residents and have a wide  and long-lasting effect on their economic, social and educational development. U.S. Census data can be used to determine the concentration of poverty at the neighborhood level_The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
